SEARCH
Package com.example.chicksevent.fragment_org

Class HostedEventFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.example.chicksevent.fragment_org.HostedEventFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class HostedEventFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
Fragment that lists events hosted by the current organizer (device user).

The list is populated by reading from the Event root and filtering for entries where the organizer matches this device's Android ID. Each list row (inflated from item_hosted_event.xml) exposes actions to view organizer details for an event or open an update flow for that event.

Navigation:
  • To NotificationFragment
  • To EventFragment
  • To CreateEventFragment
  • To EventDetailOrgFragment (view action)
  • To UpdateEventFragment (update action)

    • listEvents

      public void listEvents()
      Queries the Event root once, filters for events whose organizer equals this device's androidId, and binds the result set to the list view.

      On item interaction, navigates to EventDetailOrgFragment (view) or UpdateEventFragment (update) depending on the clicked control.
